Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ClientController
public class ClientController extends Object
This class implements a Singleton controller for the client. This controller's functionalities are shared by every class that implements View. Its main task is to handle the flow of game messages, including principally retry and next state messages, and check if a certain message coming from the client is able to be accepted from the server (only in terms of current state).

    • getClientController

      public static ClientController getClientController()
      Returns the Singleton instance of the ClientController
      Returns:
      the Singleton instance of the ClientController

    • setIsLocal

      public void setIsLocal()
      Called when the match is played locally. Sets the variable 'local' as true and sets the corresponding variable in Message.

    • setView

      public void setView​(View view)
      Setter of the view (in order to call update/layout methods on it).
      Parameters:
      view - the cli/gui view

    • isLocal

      public boolean isLocal()
      Getter
      Returns:
      true if this match is played locally, false elsewhere.

    • updateCurrentState

      public void updateCurrentState​(StoCMessage msg)
      Processes retry/next states messages: - for retries: prints an error layout message after re-printing the current state layout message. - for next states: prints the new state layout message and sets the lastRound flag to false at the beginning of the starting phase (for a correct rematch reset).
      Parameters:
      msg - the received message

    • printRetry

      public void printRetry​(String errMessage, StateName currentState)
      Called after an internal (from the KeyboardReader) or external (after a server's retry message) retry call.
      Parameters:
      errMessage - the error message
      currentState - the state of the player after the retry

    • printMatchResults

      public void printMatchResults​(String message, Map<String,​Integer> ranking)
      Calls the specific view's ranking print method.
      Parameters:
      message - an extra message
      ranking - the final non-sorted ranking

    • printLastRound

      public void printLastRound()
      Calls the specific view's last round print method.

    • printTokenDraw

      public void printTokenDraw​(String tokenName, int remainingTokens)
      Calls the specific view's token draw print method.
      Parameters:
      tokenName - the name of the token
      remainingTokens - the number of tokens left on the stack

    • send

      public boolean send​(CtoSMessage message)
      Controls if the message can be sent to the server and then sends it, or compute it directly if the match is played locally
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send
      Returns:
      true if the message has been sent

    • isAccepted

      public boolean isAccepted​(CtoSMessageType type)
      Checks if the CtoSMessageType is correct basing on the current player's state.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the message
      Returns:
      true if it's accepted to leave the client, false elsewhere

    • setLightMatch

      public void setLightMatch​(Summary summary)
      Takes a Summary and sets the local LightMatch with it.
      Parameters:
      summary - the summary coming from the SummaryMessage

    • printCardInfo

      public void printCardInfo​(String request)
      Takes a string request, elaborates it and extracts the IDs of the cards to print. Then calls the drawCards method on the view to print them properly.
      Parameters:
      request - the string to elaborate

    • printRematchOffer

      public void printRematchOffer​(String message)
      Calls a "rematch offered" layout print on the view.
      Parameters:
      message - the nickname of the proposer

    • printGoodbyeMessage

      public void printGoodbyeMessage​(String msg)
      Receives a goodbye message from the server and calls the layout method on the view to print it properly.
      Parameters:
      msg - the goodbye message

    • printDiscountMap
